decoworld.server.gambling

Class PokerGameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.gambling.PokerGameHandler

  • public class PokerGameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the server side of an actual poker game. Runs the game, and sends and receives messages to do with the specific poker game.

        Adds the specified player and their connection to the players hashmap
        Parameters:
        player - the playerId of the player that is connecting
        c - the connection the player is connecting on
        Returns:
        true if the player connected successfully false if the player failed to connect properly

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String player,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cards,
               boolean turn)
        Sends a message to the specified player's client
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose client is to receive the message
        cards - the cards they now have access to (hand + visible house cards)
        turn - whether it is the player's turn (used to check whether the player can do things)
